title: Quick - Easy - Consistent
text: As an early adopter, this app has been outstanding to use. I strongly recommend it for anyone who is dyslexic or has any issues conveying their thoughts in writing clearly. I've used many AI apps. There's nothing quite like Letterly. To be able to open my phone, record a voice memo, and come back to it later has been outstanding. I've created a couple custom prompts that I use on a regular basis like TLDR or tone changing or removing the ums. And because I'm using a lot of dictation, there are a couple ums that make their way into my voice transcripts. So, if you're on the fence about an app that will allow you to convey consistent communication written, just get this app. It's great!

title: Admissions
text: Perfect!

title: My Go-To App
text: I have had Letterly on my iPhone and MacBook Air for about a year now.  I can’t say that I use it every single day, but it is my go-to app for recording audio for anything.  It’s perfect if I just need the audio, a transcript, a summary, or any combination thereof.  It is so easy to use and I love the user interface.  With each iteration of new features, it makes it more and more valuable.      Keep up the good work.  I have very few apps that rise to “go-to” status and this is definitely on the short list.

title: An absolute time-saver
text: Perfect for interviews so I can get transcriptions. Need a reminder of what anyone said? The recordings are right there too. Been using letterly for almost a year and I can't work without it!

title: A scam

title: Big Promise, Big Fizzle
text: I bought a lifetime access for my iPhone and my MacBook Pro. The girl in the video is very pleasant and friendly. She says just do this. Just do that and I tried to just do this and just do that. I can’t get it to work. Because there are no instructions on how to do what the pleasant girl tells me to do. I need help, please.

title: Life Changer
text: I don’t know how I ever lived without this app in my life, for my note taking sermons and teachings. Amazing!!

title: Love this app!
text: Great for transcription and formatting at public presentations that I regularly attend.

title: THREE STARS  MAY BE MISLEADING
text: I think that I will really like this application, the potential for me is pretty large. Yet, I had a difficult time getting it installed and don’t find it particularly intuitive to use. Admittedly, I have not worked at learning the details using it, so I will rewrite this review in a couple of weeks

title: Formatting
text: I wrote a short document to be published in a newsletter. It was properly formatted with paragraphs. When I submitted for publication, it became a run together long paragraph with no breaks. Not helpful.

title: Moni
text: Best app ever!!! I literally use it everyday a dozen of times. I truly feel this app is a still if you can get it at a life-time deal.

title: The very best AI App, so Accurate
text: This App is very accurate when writing your voice notes. In addition it's redaction is very human.  Customer service is amazing.

title: Need to work on bugs
text: I have been loving the app so far, and have been happy to see its interface offering new features…except it’s now crashing! Hopefully an update comes out soon to fix this glitch. It reminds me of the bad old days of computer software…

title: Beware
text: Bought premium from add. Downloaded app and it wants to still charge me to upgrade. Emailed them and no response. I paid for nothing.

title: Cancelling
text: Cancelling after just a fee minutes. Not happy with the functionality and ease of use for new members. Also the email link to their customer support does not work on my iphone through the app.
